member.name: T:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.CharacterizationEngine
member.summary: A class to perform characterization queries for collections of Model components. Characterization operations are assumed to take place against component collections, not a Model or StartLinks/StopLinks collections.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.CharacterizationEngine.#ctor(SystemsAnalysis.Modeling.Links,System.String,SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.Settings)
member.summary: Constructor for the CharacterizationEngine.
member.param: A Links collection to be characterized.
A Settings DataSet that contains information regarding the source files for the characterization engine.
A title for the study area used when creating table headers.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.CharacterizationEngine.LoadCharacterizationTables
member.summary: Loads the AGMaster and Results Warehouse DataSets.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.CharacterizationEngine.Characterize
member.summary: Generates an XML characterization report using the parameters specified in the constructor.

member.summary: Internally called function that fires the OnStatusChanged event.
member.param: Parameter that contains the string describing the new state.

Specifies whether a line break should be appended to the end of the status text.

member.name: T:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic
member.summary: Summary description for DSCHydraulics.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic.DSCID
member.summary: Returns the DSCID associated with this DSC hydraulic modeling results. The DSCID is equal to ParcelID * 100 + DivideID.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic.HGL
member.summary: Returns the peak HGL all the pipe that this DSC is connected to.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic.DeltaHGL
member.summary: Returns the difference between the peak HGL and the finished floor elevation for a given DSC.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic.Surcharge
member.summary: Returns the surcharge elevation of pipe connected to this DSC, at the point of connection.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic.DSC
member.summary: Gets or sets the DSC object associated with this DSC hydraulic results object. Returns null is this DSC hydraulic result does not have an associated DSC object.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic.HasDSC
member.summary: Indicates if this DSCHydraulic object contains a reference to an associated DSC object.

member.name: T:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics
member.summary: A strongly-typed collection of DSCHydraulic objects.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty DSCHydraulics collection.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.#ctor(SystemsAnalysis.Modeling.DSCs,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for a DSCHydraulics collection. This collection will contain a subset of the master DSCHydraulics table whose DSCID values exist in the provided DSCs collection.
member.param: A DSCs collection whose DSCID values should be added to this DSCHydraulics collection.
The Scenario ID of the DSCHydraulics collection.
The database to read model results from. Typically will be the Central Data Store for modeling results.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.CountBySewerBackupRisk(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the number of DSCHydraulic objects in this collection that have basement backup risk within the specified range. Basement backup risk is determined using DSCHydraulic.DeltaHGL. Direct subcatchments that have a 'False Positive' (determined by DSC.FalseBFRisk) flooding risk are excluded from the total.
member.param: The mininum basement backup risk to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum basement backup risk to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
member.returns: The number of DSC objects in this collection within the specified range.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.Add(SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulic)
member.summary: Adds a DSCHydraulic object to this collection.
member.param: The DSCHydraulic object to add to this collection.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.Remove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a DSCHydraulic object from this DSCHydraulics collection.
member.param: The dscID of the DSCHydraulic object to remove from this DSCHydraulics collection.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.Contains(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether this DSCHydraulics collection contains a DSCHydraulic object with the specified dscID.
member.returns: true if the specified dscID was found, otherwise false.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.OnValidate(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Event that occurs when a DSCHydraulic object is added to this collection. Will throw and exception if the object added is not of type DSCHydraulic.
member.param: The DSCID of the DSCHydraulic object to be added to the collection.
The DSCHydraulic object to be added to this collection.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the DSCHydraulic object with the specified dscID.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.Keys
member.summary: Gets an ICollection containing a collection of dscID integers contained in the DSCHydraulics collection.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.DSCHydraulics.Values
member.summary: Gets an ICollection containing a collection of DSCHydraulic objects contained in this DSCHydraulics collection. Use this method to enumerate through the DSCHydraulics collection using the "foreach" enumerator.

member.summary: Displays a prompt in a dialog box, waits for the user to input text or click a button.
member.param: String expression displayed as the message in the dialog box
String expression displayed in the title bar of the dialog box
String expression displayed in the text box as the default response
Delegate used to validate the text
Numeric expression that specifies the distance of the left edge of the dialog box from the left edge of the screen.
Numeric expression that specifies the distance of the upper edge of the dialog box from the top of the screen
member.returns: An InputBoxResult object with the Text and the OK property set to true when OK was clicked.

member.name: T:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic
member.summary: Summary description for LinkHydraulics.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.LinkID
member.summary: The LinkID of this LinkHydraulic object.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.MLinkID
member.summary: The MLinkID associated with this pipe, or 0 if the pipe is not represented in the master links database.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.MaxQ
member.summary: The peak modeled flow for this pipe in cfs.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.MaxV
member.summary: The peak modeled velocity for this pipe in fps.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.QQRatio
member.summary: The peak flow to design flow ratio for this pipe.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.MaxUSElev
member.summary: The maximum modeled water surface elevation at the upstream end of the pipe.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.MaxDSElev
member.summary: The maximum modeled water surface elevation at the downstream end of the pipe.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.Link
member.summary: Gets or sets the Link object associated with this LinkHydraulic object. Returns null if there is no associated Link object.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulic.HasLink
member.summary: Indicates if this LinkHydraulic object contains a reference to an associated Link object.

member.name: T:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics
member.summary: A strongly-typed collection of LinkHydraulic objects.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty LinkHydraulics collection.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics.#ctor(SystemsAnalysis.Modeling.Links,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for a LinksHydraulics collection. This collection will contain a subset of the master LinksHydraulics table whose MLinkIDs corresponds to those in the provided Links collection.
member.param: A Links collection whose MLinkID values should be added to the this LinkHydraulics collection.
The Scenario ID of the LinkHydraulics collection.
The database to read model results from. Typically will be the Central Data Store for modeling results.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics.CountByQQRatio(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the number of LinkHydraulic objects in this collection that have a Max Model Q to Design Q ratio within the specified range.
member.param: The mininum Q/Q ratio to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum Q/Q ratio to count (inclusive). To select a lower bound only use System.Double.Max for this parameter.
member.returns: The number of pipe segments within the specifed range.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics.CountByQQRatio(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the number of LinkHydraulic objects in this collection that have a Max Model Q to Design Q ratio within the specified range and a pipe diameter within the specified range.
member.param: The mininum Q/Q ratio to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum Q/Q ratio to count (inclusive). To select a lower bound only use System.Double.Max for this parameter.
The minimum pipe diameter to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum pipe diameter to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
member.returns: The number of pipe segments within the specifed Q/Q range and pipe diameter range.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics.CountByQQRatioLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the length of LinkHydraulic objects in feet in this collection that have a Max Model Q to Design Q ratio within the specified range and a pipe diameter within the specified range.
member.param: The mininum Q/Q ratio to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum Q/Q ratio to count (inclusive). To select a lower bound only use System.Double.Max for this parameter.
The minimum pipe diameter to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum pipe diameter to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
member.returns: The length of pipe segments in feet within the specifed Q/Q range and pipe diameter range.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics.PipeSurchargeCount(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the number of LinkHydraulic objects in this collection that have pipe surcharge within the specified range.
member.param: The mininum pipe surcharge value to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum pipe surcharge value to count (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MaxValue for this parameter.
member.returns: The number of pipes in this collection within the specified range.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.LinkHydraulics.PipeSurchargeLength(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the total length of the surcharged pipe segments in this collection have pipe surcharge within the specified range.
member.param: The mininum pipe surcharge value to include (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MinValue for this parameter.
The maximum pipe surcharge value to include (inclusive). To select an upper bound only use System.Double.MaxValue for this parameter.
member.returns: The total length of the pipe segments in this collection with surcharge values within the specified range.

member.summary: Gets an ICollection containing a collection of MLinkID integers contained in the LinkHydraulics collection.

member.name: T:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic
member.summary: Summary description for NodeHydraulics.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic.#ctor(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader)
member.summary: Constructs a NodeHydraulic object using a ADO.NET data reader. Should only be called from the NodeHydraulics collection.
member.param: An ADO.NET data reader containing a DataRow that matches the node hydraulics schema.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic.Name
member.summary: The six character "licencse plate" ID of this node, AKA the Hansen ID.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic.MaxElevation
member.summary: The maximum water surface elevation at this node.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic.Surcharge
member.summary: The amount of surcharge at this node, measured relative to the crown of the highest pipe connected to this node.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic.Freeboard
member.summary: The distance between the maximum water surface elevation and the ground elvation in feet. If this is 0 or less, then street flooding is occcuring.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic.SurchargeTime
member.summary: The amount of time in minutes that pipes connected to this node are experiencing surcharging.

member.name: P:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulic.FloodedTime
member.summary: The amount of time in minutes that this node is flooding to the street.

member.name: T:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulics
member.summary: A strongly-typed collection of NodeHydraulic objects.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulics.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty NodeHydraulics collection.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulics.#ctor(SystemsAnalysis.Modeling.Nodes,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for a NodeHydraulics collection. This collection will contain a subset of the master NodeHydraulics table which exist as the up- or downstream nodes in the provided Links collection.
member.param: A Links collection whose up- and downstream nodes should be added to the this Nodes collection.
The Scenario ID of the NodeHydraulics collection.
The database to read model results from. Typically will be the Central Data Store for modeling results.

member.summary: Adds a NodeHydraulic object to this collection.

member.name: M:SystemsAnalysis.Characterization.NodeHydraulics.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether this NodeHydraulics collection contains a NodeHydraulic object with the specified nodeName.

member.summary: Event that occurs when a NodeHydraulic object is added to this collection. Will throw and exception if the object added is not of type NodeHydraulic.
member.param: The node name of the NodeHydraulic object to be added to the collection.
